short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use Youtube visible on every page in the side panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube Sidepanel Chrome Extension
------------------------------------------------------------

The YouTube Sidepanel Chrome Extension offers a streamlined way to enhance your YouTube experience by providing a convenient sidebar that includes quick access tools and features. Whether you’re a frequent viewer, content creator, or simply looking to improve your browsing efficiency, this extension is designed to help you do more on YouTube without leaving your current page.

Key Features:
----------------------
Quick Access: Open a customizable sidebar with a single click for easy access to your most-used YouTube tools and features.

Multitasking Made Easy: Browse videos while taking notes, searching for related content, or managing playlists—all from the side panel.

Compact and Non-intrusive: The side panel keeps your screen uncluttered, allowing you to focus on the main content.

Seamless Integration: The extension integrates directly with YouTube’s interface, adding valuable features without disrupting your viewing experience.

Take your YouTube browsing to the next level with the YouTube Sidepanel Chrome Extension. Try it now and experience a new way to interact with your favorite content!
